nodes.text: This individual served as an admiral in the Galactic Republic's Navy during the Clone Wars.

The admiral represented the Republic Starfleet in hosting a HoloNet News press conference shortly after the destruction of Ares Nune's naval task force in 22 BBY. He exhibited a radio recording from Nune's command ship and told the journalists present that further information would be divulged after they had been studied and declassified.
